column6: Which heroes and icons are hell-bent on defending the Earth from the invasion, and who thinks a new era has dawned for mankind? The final double-page spread of this issue will send chills down your spine, and that is a promise!!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:Gabriele Dell'Otto | penciller:Leinil Francis Yu | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Laura Martin | inker:Mark Morales
